name: github-action-cleanup-releases-and-tags
description: This removes unused Tags and Releases that are created during the PR process
author: Jamie Nelson <jamie@wearsafe.com>

scripts.release: yarn run format && yarn run lint && yarn run build && yarn run package
scripts.all: yarn run build && yarn run format && yarn run lint && yarn run package && yarn test
scripts.postversion: echo 'Running post versioning commands';git push --tags && git push && echo "Successfully released version $npm_package_version!"
scripts.generate-docs: echo 'Generating docs';if [ ! -f 'lib/misc/generate-docs.js' ];then tsc;fi; node -e "require('./lib/misc/generate-docs.js').updateUsage(actionReference='Broadshield/github-action-generate-tag-name-from-maven-or-gradle@v' + require('./package.json').version.toString())" && sed -i "s|Broadshield/github-action-generate-tag-name-from-maven-or-gradle@\(.*\)\$|Broadshield/github-action-generate-tag-name-from-maven-or-gradle@v$(node -p -e "require('./package.json').version")|g" README.md;git add README.md

hooks.pre-commit: yarn run release; git add dist
